text: Petersburg is a city in Virginia in the United States. It is on the Appomattox River. The city's population was 33,458 as of 2020. Part of Petersburg National Battlefield Park is in the city. The area has three schools of higher education: * John Tyler Community College * Richard Bland College * Virginia State University ==References== Category:Cities in Virginia Category:1740s establishments in Virginia Category:1748 establishments
title: Petersburg, Virginia
